name: Deploy Troops
description: Deploy 1 Troop. For the next 3 turns, you deal 2 damage for each Troop you have deployed.

immediateEffect.script: if (!State.ContainsKey("troops")) State["troops"] = 0; State["troops"] = (int)State["troops"] + 1; Log(PlayerDisplayName + " deploys a troop! Total: " + State["troops"]);

hooks.OnTurnStart: int troops = State.ContainsKey("troops") ? (int)State["troops"] : 0; int damage = troops * 2; DealDamage(Opponent, damage);
